thread.title: Atrenne Integrated Solutions name new CFO
thread.title_full: Atrenne Integrated Solutions name new CFO

author: Gulli Arnason
title: Atrenne Integrated Solutions name new CFO
text:
Atrenne Integrated Solutions name new CFO 
  
Atrenne Integrated Solutions said it has announced the appointment of Robert J. Gold as senior vice president and chief financial officer. 
Gold brings extensive global finance experience and expertise in business planning, operations, financial management, lean/policy deployment, and mergers/acquisitions. Prior to joining Atrenne, he was the CFO of Culligan International, a global water treatment company where he led substantial improvements in financial/accounting processes, cash and working capital management, and operations. 
Atrenne Integrated Solutions is an advanced integrated systems provider serving high-technology industries. Comprised of AbelConn Electronics, LLC, Atrenne Computing Solutions, and Photo EtchÂ©, Atrenne has more than 40 years of experience in the design and manufacturing of electro-mechanical integrated solutions for rugged and harsh environments. The company is headquartered in the United States with manufacturing operations in the United States and China.
